title: Introducing: Dead Dreams
content:
If 2012 taught us anything, it was to expect more vocal reverb and fuzzier guitars in 2013.

Well the prophecy is very much baring out into reality, and for our latest discovery I couldn’t be happier. Meet Dead Dreams, a duo from France who appear to have only formed and released their first demo EP in the past week. However despite coming to the surface in a staggeringly quick succession of events, the music itself does not suffer and instead it’s a blistering combination of emphatic guitar melodies and driving percussion. I’m sure there will be a plethora of comparisons to acts of yesteryear, but there’s no point in listing them here when you can listen to the whole EP for yourself below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d0e
